response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but considering its worth to you, I believe it could be a game-changer in your endeavors. I am offering this product to you for $14,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth. I am confident it will serve you well and provide substantial returns on your investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
